channel.title: Agustí Alentorn on Agustí Alentorn
channel.description: Recent content in Agustí Alentorn on Agustí Alentorn

item.title: PRT-K
item.description:
This project is funded by the Institut National du Cancer INCa and the DGOS and aim to model mathematically the evolution of Primary Central Nervous System Lymphoma (PCNSL).

It is a partnership between different teams:

  1. AP-HP, Pr HOANG-XUAN and Dr ALENTORN
  2. CEA-Neurospin Dr FROUIN
  3. INRIA from Paris, Dr DRASDO
  4. INRIA from Bordeaux, Dr SAUT and
  5. Institut Curie, Dr SOUSSAIN

It will combine radiomics data, NGS, and microscopic data from data to model and microscopic and mesoscale the evolution of PCNSL. It addition we will also use a mouse model of PCNSL to further improve our knowledge in this rare disease.

CIT
item.description:
This project is funded by the La Ligue Nationale Contre le Cancer - Carte d’Idendité de Tumeurs, CIT

This project is leaded by Dr ALENTORN and aims to analyze PCNSL using multi-comics NGS data:

  1. Whole-exome
  2. RNA-seq
  3. Methylation
  4. Radiomics

We will use a large cohort of PCNSL to underpin new potential therapeutic targets in this orphan disease.

item.title: 17p Homodisomy Is Associated With Better Outcome in 1p19q Non-Codeleted and IDH-Mutated Gliomas
